snippet: A commission says FedEx Ground employed a significant number of deaf package handlers nationwide but failed to provide needed accommodations.
abstract: Equal Employment Opportunity Commission has filed lawsuit charging that FedEx discriminated for years against deaf and partly deaf workers and applicants.
lead_paragraph: A commission says FedEx Ground employed a significant number of deaf package handlers nationwide but failed to provide needed accommodations.

headline.main: Fedex Accused of Discriminating Against the Deaf
headline.print_headline: FedEx Accused of Discriminating Against the Deaf
